dct_title_s: Map of the eastern portion of British North America, including the Gulf of St. Lawrence, and part of the New England states
dct_alternative_sm: Map of the eastern portion of British North America, including the Gulf of St. Lawrence, and part of the New England states / compiled from the latest surveys and charts, by Henry F. Perley for the report of Israel D. Andrews', to Hon. Thomas Corwin, Secretary of the Treasury.
dct_description_sm: 1 map : hand col., dissected in 3 pieces and mounted on cloth ; 64 x 115 cm
In upper left margin: House Ex. Doc., no. 136.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
